snippet: Apps and digital concierges are reaching out to the affluent with carefully curated and vetted offerings.
abstract: Mobile apps and digital concierges are reaching out to the affluent with carefully curated and vetted offerings; some of most popular Web sites and apps among wealthy are highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Apps and digital concierges are reaching out to the affluent with carefully curated and vetted offerings.

headline.main: Have to Ask What the App Costs? It’s Not for You
headline.print_headline: Have to Ask What the App Costs? It’s Not for You
